name: Bacon-Wrapped Cherries
ingredients: {'quantity': '36', 'unit': '', 'name': 'maraschino cherries, stemmed, drained and juice reserved'}, {'quantity': '18', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'bacon slices, halved'}, {'quantity': '36', 'unit': '', 'name': 'toothpicks'}
steps: Set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.. Wrap each cherry with a bacon half, secure with a toothpick, and arrange on a baking sheet. Drizzle reserved cherry juice over wrapped cherries.. Broil in the preheated oven until bacon is crisped to your liking, 3 to 10 minutes.

name: Prosciutto-Wrapped Pork Tenderloin with Crispy Sage
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'pork tenderloin'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh sage, leaves removed and stems discarded, divided'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'prosciutto'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil, or more as needed'}
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Lightly season pork with salt and black pepper. Arrange about 6 sage leaves over tenderloin. Wrap prosciutto around tenderloin and sage, overlapping prosciutto slightly; wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate to allow prosciutto to set on pork tenderloin, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove plastic wrap.. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Fry wrapped tenderloin in the hot oil until prosciutto is crispy and lightly browned on all sides, 8 to 10 minutes. Transfer wrapped tenderloin to a baking dish, reserving oil in the skillet.. Bake tenderloin in the preheated oven until pork is cooked through, about 20 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).. Heat reserved oil in the skillet over medium heat; fry remaining sage leaves until crispy, adding more oil as needed, about 5 minutes.. Slice tenderloin and serve with crispy sage leaves.

ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'ground beef'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'green bell pepper, diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(28 ounce) can', 'name': 'diced tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(16 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato paste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}

name: Roasted Pork Loin
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried rosemary'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'boneless pork loin roast'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white wine'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Crush garlic with rosemary, salt, and pepper in a mortar and pestle to make a paste.. Pierce meat with a sharp knife in several places and press garlic paste into the openings. Rub pork loin with the remaining garlic mixture and olive oil. Set into an oven-safe pan.. Place pork loin into the preheated oven, turning and basting with pan liquids every 30 minutes. Cook until the pork is no longer pink in the center, 90 minutes to 2 hours. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). Remove roast to a platter and keep warm.. Place pan onto the stove over medium-high heat and pour wine into it. Heat wine and stir to loosen browned bits from the bottom of the pan. Simmer for 3 to 5 minutes.. Slice pork loin and serve with pan juices.

steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Cut broccoli florets from the stalk. Peel the stalk and slice into 1/4-inch slices. Mix florets and stem pieces with olive oil in a bowl and transfer to a baking sheet; season with salt and pepper.. Roast in the preheated oven until broccoli is tender and lightly browned, about 18 to 20 minutes.

name: High Temperature Eye-of-Round Roast
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3 pound)', 'name': 'beef eye of round roast'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).. Season roast with salt and pepper.. Place in a roasting pan or baking dish. Do not cover or add water.. Place roast in the preheated oven and reduce temperature to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C). Roast for 21 minutes (7 minutes per pound), then turn off the oven and let roast sit in the hot oven for 2 1/2 hours. Do not open the door at all during this time.. Remove roast from the oven and check that the internal temperature is at least 145 degrees F (65 degrees C). Carve into thin slices to serve.

name: Creole Seasoning Blend
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Combine paprika, salt, onion powder, garlic powder, oregano, basil, thyme, black pepper, white pepper, and cayenne pepper.. Store in an airtight container.

name: Homemade Poultry Seasoning
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground dried sage'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground dried marjoram'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground dried rosemary'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'finely ground black pepper'}

name: Deep-Fried Turkey
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'gallons', 'name': 'peanut oil for frying, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 pound)', 'name': 'whole turkey, neck and giblets removed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Creole seasoning'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'white onion'}
steps: Gather the ingredients. Fill a turkey fryer or large stockpot with enough oil to fry turkey; be sure to leave room for turkey so oil doesn't spill over. Heat oil to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Layer a large platter with food-safe paper bags.. Rinse turkey and thoroughly pat dry with paper towels. Rub seasoning inside the cavity and all over the outer surfaces. Make sure the hole at the neck is open at least 2 inches so oil can flow freely into the cavity.. Turn off the heat source. Place whole onion into the drain basket followed by turkey, neck-end first. Slowly lower the basket into the fryer until turkey is completely submerged in oil. Turn on the heat source and cook, maintaining oil temperature at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 45 minutes, or 3 1/2 minutes per pound.. Carefully remove the basket from the fryer and drain turkey. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh, near the bone, should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C) but no more than 180 degrees F (80 degrees C). Transfer turkey to the prepared platter to finish draining, 10 to 15 minutes.. Serve warm and enjoy!

name: Homemade Seasoned Salt
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': None, 'name': 'teaspoon cayenne pepper'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Combine salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper in an airtight container.. Seal and shake to blend.

name: Fried Cabbage with Bacon, Onion, and Garlic
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'bacon, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'onion, diced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large head', 'name': 'cabbage, cored and sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Place bacon in a large stockpot and cook over medium-high heat until crispy, about 10 minutes.. Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until onion caramelizes, about 10 minutes.. Immediately stir in cabbage and continue to cook and stir another 10 minutes.. Season with salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, and paprika. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer, stirring occasionally, about 30 minutes more.. Enjoy!

name: Sarah's Easy Shredded Chicken Taco Filling
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast halves'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced onion'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground cumin'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'chili powder'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Place chicken breasts in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then simmer until no longer pink, 10 to 12 minutes.. Transfer chicken breasts to a bowl. Allow to cool briefly, then shred with 2 forks.. Heat vegetable oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until translucent, 2 to 3 minutes.. Stir in shredded chicken, tomato sauce, cumin, and chili powder. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer until chicken is hot and flavors have blended, about 3 minutes.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Easy Lemon-Pepper Chicken Wings
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'oil, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'extra-virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'lemon-pepper seasoning'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'chicken wings'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).. Stir olive oil and lemon-pepper seasoning together in a bowl; set aside.. Fry wings in hot oil until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 8 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).. Toss hot wings with lemon-pepper mixture to coat.. Enjoy!

name: Fish in Foil
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'rainbow trout fillets'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'garlic salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'sheets', 'name': 'heavy-duty aluminum foil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh jalapeno pepper, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Rinse and pat fillets dry. Rub fillets with olive oil, and season with garlic salt and black pepper.. Place each fillet on a large sheet of aluminum foil. Top with jalapeno slices, and squeeze the juice from the ends of the lemon over fillets.. Arrange remaining lemon slices on top of fillets.. Carefully seal all edges of the foil to form enclosed packets. Place packets on a baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 15 to 20 minutes depending on size of fillets.

name: Easy Homemade Pizza Sauce
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato paste'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'extra virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried rosemary, crushed'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Mix together water, tomato paste, and olive oil in a large bowl or jar. Add garlic, oregano, basil, rosemary, salt, and pepper; mix well.. Let sauce stand for several hours to let flavors blend. No cooking is necessary; just spread on dough.

name: Chef John's Perfect Hard-Boiled Eggs
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}
steps: Place eggs in a saucepan and pour in cold water to cover; place over high heat. When water starts to simmer and eggs start to dance around a little, turn off heat, cover the pan quickly with a lid, and let stand for 17 minutes. Don't peek.. Pour out hot water and pour cold water over eggs. Drain and refill with cold water; let stand until eggs are cool, about 20 minutes.. Peel eggs under running water.

name: Roasted Okra
ingredients: {'quantity': '18', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh okra pods, sliced 1/3 inch thick'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'kosher salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'black pepper, or to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.. Arrange okra in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil; sprinkle with kosher salt and pepper.. Roast in the preheated oven until okra is lightly browned and tender, 10 to 15 minutes.

name: Blackened Chicken
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cumin'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground white pepper'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'skinless, boneless chicken breast halves'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cooking spray'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.. Heat a cast iron skillet over high heat until it is smoking hot, about 3 to 5 minutes.. While the skillet is heating, mix paprika, cayenne, cumin, thyme, onion powder, white pepper, and salt together in a small bowl.. Spray chicken breasts on both sides with cooking spray, then coat evenly with spice mixture.. Place chicken in the hot pan and cook for 1 minute. Turn, and cook 1 minute on other side. Transfer chicken to the prepared baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 5 to 10 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).. Serve and enjoy!

name: Unstuffed Cabbage Roll
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'ground beef'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small head', 'name': 'cabbage, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(14.5 ounce) cans', 'name': 'diced tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}

name: Grilled Veggie Skewers
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh pineapple, cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'zucchinis, cut into 1-inch slices'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'yellow squash, cut into 1-inch slices'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'whole fresh mushrooms'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'red onion, cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cherry tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'red bell pepper, cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bamboo skewers, soaked in water for 20 minutes'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Preheat a grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate. Alternately thread pineapple chunks, zucchini slices, yellow squash slices, mushrooms, onion chunks, tomatoes, and bell pepper chunks onto skewers.. Whisk olive oil, basil, oregano, salt, and black pepper in a bowl; brush some of the mixture over vegetables.. Cook skewers on the preheated grill until vegetables are tender, turning and basting vegetables with remaining olive oil mixture occasionally, 10 to 15 minutes.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Homemade Pickling Spice

name: Best Marinara Sauce Yet
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(14.5 ounce) cans', 'name': 'stewed tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato paste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely diced onion'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white wine'}
steps: Place tomatoes, tomato paste, parsley, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper in a food processor; blend until smooth.. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook until slightly softened, about 2 minutes.. Stir in blended tomato sauce and white wine.. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 30 minutes.

name: Perfect Flat Iron Steak
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(2 pound)', 'name': 'flat iron steak'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh rosemary'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh chives'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Cabernet Sauvignon (or other dry red wine)'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dry mustard powder'}

name: Baked Fresh Rainbow Trout
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'olive oil, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole rainbow trout, gutted and cleaned, heads and tails still on'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried dill weed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'onion, sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'thin slices', 'name': 'lemon (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'hot water'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with 1 teaspoon olive oil.. Place trout in the prepared baking dish and coat with remaining olive oil. Gather the seasoning ingredients.. Season inside and outside of fish with dill, thyme, and salt. Stuff each fish with onion slices; grind pepper on top. Place 1 lemon slice on each fish.. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes; add hot water to dish. Continue baking until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes more.. Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Daddy Eddie's Roast Pork (Pernil), Puerto Rican-Style
ingredients: {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'pork shoulder, trimmed of excess fat'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Combine garlic cloves, olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and black pepper in a mortar and pestle; mash into a paste.. Cut deep slits into pork with a small knife. Stuff slits with garlic paste; rub any remaining paste over pork.. Place pork in a plastic roasting bag and put in a roasting pan with a rack. Let marinate in the refrigerator, 8 to 48 hours.. Take pork out of the refrigerator, uncover, and bring to room temperature, 1 to 2 hours.. Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).. Roast pork skin-side down in the preheated oven until golden-brown, about 2 hours.. Flip pork and continue roasting, skin-side up, until juices run clear and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), 2 to 4 hours more.

ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(5 pound)', 'name': 'whole beef tenderloin'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'garlic cloves, minced'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced fresh rosemary'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'coarsely ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried thyme leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'salt'}

name: Best Salmon Bake
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 pound)', 'name': 'salmon fillet, halved'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'tomato, chopped'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green onions, chopped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'pepper'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Place salmon on a lightly oiled sheet pan or in a shallow baking dish, folding under thin outer edges of fillets for even cooking.. Top salmon with chopped tomatoes and green onions, and season with salt and pepper.. Cook salmon in the preheated oven, uncovered, until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 20 minutes.

name: Southern-Style Neck Bones
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onions, roughly chopped'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, roughly chopped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'distilled white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'pork neck bones'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).. Sprinkle 3/4 of the chopped onions and 3/4 of the chopped garlic into the bottom of a roasting pan; pour in water and vinegar. Season neck bones with salt and pepper and place in the roasting pan. Sprinkle remaining onions and garlic over top and cover the roasting pan tightly with aluminum foil.. Bake in the preheated oven for 2 hours, basting every 30 minutes and recovering with the foil every time you baste.. Remove the foil and continue cooking until neck bones are golden brown, about 45 more minutes.

name: Herb Rubbed Sirloin Tip Roast
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3 pound)', 'name': 'sirloin tip roast'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Mix paprika, kosher salt, garlic powder, black pepper, onion powder, cayenne pepper, oregano, and thyme in a small bowl.. Stir in olive oil; allow mixture to sit for about 15 minutes.. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.. Place roast on the prepared baking sheet. Rub spice mixture all over roast.. Roast in the preheated oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), about 1 hour.. Let sit 15 minutes before slicing.

name: Simple Broccolini
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'broccolini'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon wedge'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'red pepper flakes (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Place broccolini in a large skillet with about 2 inches of water; bring to a boil and cook until bright green, 1 to 2 minutes. Drain.. Heat olive oil in the same skillet over medium heat. Stir in garlic and cook until golden and fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes. Add broccolini; cook and stir until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes.. Squeeze lemon juice over broccoli and season with red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.

name: Roasted Onions
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'yellow onions'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'balsamic vinegar'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Adjust the oven rack to the lowest position; preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).. Peel onions and cut in half.. Toss onion halves with oil and season generously with salt and pepper.. Place onions, cut-sides down, on a rimmed baking sheet.. Roast in the preheated oven until onions are tender and the cut surfaces are golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes.. Remove from the oven and adjust seasonings if necessary. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar to serve.

name: Blackened Seasoning Mix
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'ground dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Stir together paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, black pepper, cayenne pepper, basil, and oregano in a bowl until evenly mixed.. Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

name: Baked Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'sweet potatoes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pinches', 'name': 'dried oregano or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pinches', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pinches', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}

name: Hungarian Goulash
ingredients: {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onions, sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'Hungarian sweet paprika'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'salt, divided'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'beef stew meat, cut into 1 1/2 inch cubes'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato paste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}
steps: Heat oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Cook and stir onions in oil until soft, 2 to 4 minutes. Remove onions and set them aside.. Combine paprika, 2 teaspoons salt, and pepper in a medium bowl. Coat beef cubes in spice mixture, and cook in the onion pot until brown on all sides.. Return onions to the pot with beef; pour in water, tomato paste, garlic, and remaining 1 teaspoon salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, until meat is tender, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.

name: Herbs de Provence
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried rosemary'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'fennel seed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried savory'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried marjoram'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried lavender flowers'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'dried Italian parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried tarragon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'bay powder'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Grind rosemary and fennel seed in a spice grinder; transfer to a mixing bowl.. Add savory, thyme, basil, marjoram, lavender, parsley, oregano, tarragon, and bay powder to the bowl; stir well. Store in an airtight container between uses.

name: Bacon for the Family or a Crowd
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'thick sliced bacon'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.. Arrange the bacon in a single layer on the prepared sheet with the edges touching or slightly overlapping.. Bake in the preheated oven to desired degree of doneness, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove bacon from the baking sheet with tongs or a fork, and drain on a paper towel-lined plate.

name: Easy Pizza Sauce
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato paste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'ground oregano'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'dried minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground paprika'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Mix together tomato sauce and tomato paste in a medium bowl until smooth.. Stir in oregano, garlic, and paprika to pizza sauce mixture.. Enjoy!

name: Beef Pot Roast
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'boneless chuck roast'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bay leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'freshly ground black pepper'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).. Heat a Dutch oven or heavy pot over medium-high heat. Add oil, then sear meat in the center of the pan for 4 minutes. Turn meat over with tongs; sear for 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Remove meat from the pot.. Arrange onion, garlic, and 1 bay leaf in the bottom of the pan; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Return meat to the pan, place remaining bay leaf on top of meat, and cover.. Cook in the preheated oven for 30 minutes. Reduce heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) and continue cooking until tender, about 1 1/2 hours. An instant-read thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the roast should read 145 degrees F (65 degrees C).. Transfer roast to a platter and let rest for 10 to 15 minutes. Slice and top with onions and gravy.

name: 4-Ingredient Keto Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'peanut butter'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sugar-free vanilla extract'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.. Combine peanut butter, sweetener, egg, and vanilla extract in a bowl; mix well until a dough is formed.. Roll dough into 12 (1-inch) balls. Place on the prepared baking sheet and press down twice with a fork in a criss-cross pattern.. Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, 12 to 15 minutes.. Cool for 1 minute before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

name: Quick Pasta Sauce
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(28 ounce) can', 'name': 'crushed tomatoes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Heat oil in a large skillet over low heat; add garlic and sauté until tender, about 2 minutes.. Stir in crushed tomatoes, basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until slightly thickened, 15 to 20 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Roasted Winter Squash Seeds
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butternut squash seeds or other hard squash seeds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt, or to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.. After removing the seeds from the squash, rinse with water, and remove any strings and bits of squash. Pat seeds dry, and place in a small bowl; stir in olive oil and salt until evenly coated.. Spread seeds in an even layer on the prepared baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, or until seeds start to pop. Remove from the oven; cool on the baking sheet before serving.

name: World's Greatest Vegetable Broth
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'sweet onions, peeled and cut into wedges'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'tomatoes, cored and quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'carrots, cut into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'green bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'turnips, cubed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'celery, cut into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh parsley, chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole black peppercorns'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bay leaf'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'gallon', 'name': 'water'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).. Place onions, tomatoes, carrots, bell peppers, and turnips in a large roasting pan; drizzle with olive oil and toss to coat.. Roast in the preheated oven, stirring every 15 minutes, until vegetables are tender and onions are caramelized, about 1 hour.. Transfer roasted vegetables into a large stockpot. Add celery, parsley, garlic, peppercorns, cloves, and bay leaf. Pour in water and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, until liquid is reduced by half, 20 to 40 minutes.. Strain broth into a large bowl, reserving vegetables for another use.

name: Ground Beef and Cabbage
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large head', 'name': 'cabbage, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14.5 ounce) can', 'name': 'diced tomatoes with juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, halved and thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'lean ground beef'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Place cabbage, tomatoes with juice, onion, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper into a Dutch oven or large pot over low heat; cook and stir until it begins to simmer.. Add lean ground beef on top; cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender and ground beef is cooked through, about 45 minutes.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Easy Strawberry Vinaigrette
ingredients: {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'frozen strawberries'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'apple cider vinegar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Blend strawberries, honey, apple cider vinegar, olive oil, salt, and black pepper together in a blender until smooth.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Grilled Tri-Tip
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'tri-tip roast'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, peeled and very thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'black pepper'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'garlic salt or to taste'}
steps: Using a sharp knife, cut small slits in the top of the roast; insert garlic slices into the slits.. Mix salt, pepper, and garlic salt together in a small bowl; rub all over the tri-tip and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or up to 1 day. Remove tri-tip from the refrigerator about 20 minutes before grilling.. Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.. Place the meat directly above the flame to sear the meat and lock in the juices, about 5 to 10 minutes per side.. Turn the grill down to medium heat and continue to cook, turning occasionally, for another 25 to 30 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C) for medium-rare. Let stand, covered loosely with aluminum foil, for 5 minutes before slicing.

name: Hard-Boiled Eggs in the Oven
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Put an egg in each cup of a standard muffin tin.. Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.. Transfer baked eggs to a large bowl filled with ice water. Let sit until cooled completely, about 10 minutes.

name: Tri Tip Roast
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 1/2 pound)', 'name': 'beef tri tip roast, trimmed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried marjoram'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dry mustard'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'red wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil, or as needed'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Rub beef all over with thyme, basil, marjoram, dry mustard, salt, and black pepper; transfer into a resealable plastic bag. Seal the bag and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.. Pour red wine into the bag 4 hours before cooking.. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Drizzle olive oil over the bottom of a roasting pan; transfer beef into the prepared roasting pan.. Roast in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue roasting until slightly pink in the center, 20 to 25 minutes more. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 140 degrees F (60 degrees C). Let rest for 5 to 10 minutes before thinly slicing against the grain.

name: Chili Powder
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'oregano'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'cumin'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'cayenne pepper, or to taste (Optional)'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Whisk paprika, oregano, cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl. Store refrigerated in an airtight container.

name: Asparagus Wrapped in Crisp Prosciutto
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '16', 'unit': 'spears', 'name': 'fresh asparagus, trimmed'}, {'quantity': '16', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'prosciutto'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and coat with olive oil.. Wrap one slice of prosciutto around each asparagus spear, starting at the bottom, and spiraling up to the tip. Place the wrapped spears on the prepared baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven for 5 minutes. Remove, and shake the pan back and forth to roll the spears over. Return to the oven until asparagus is tender and prosciutto is crisp, another 5 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Ginger-Turmeric Herbal Tea
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground turmeric'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh ginger'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon wedge'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Bring water to a boil in a small saucepan; add turmeric, ginger, and cinnamon.. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes.. Strain tea into a large glass.. Stir in honey and serve with lemon wedge.

name: Tomatillo Salsa Verde
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'tomatillos, husked'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'finely chopped onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'serrano chile pepper, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped cilantro'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh oregano'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cumin'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}

name: Easy Bok Choy
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, crushed and chopped'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'heads', 'name': 'baby bok choy, trimmed and cut into bite-size pieces'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat; cook garlic in hot oil until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.. Mix in bok choy; cook and stir until the leafy green parts turn bright green and the stalks become slightly translucent, 5 to 8 minutes. Sprinkle with salt and serve.

name: Puerto Rican Tostones (Fried Plantains)
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green plantain'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'oil for frying'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Peel plantain and cut into 1-inch slices. Fill a bowl with 3 cups of cold water.. Heat oil in a large deep skillet over medium-high heat; add plantain slices in an even layer and fry on both sides until golden brown, about 3 1/2 minutes per side. Set skillet aside.. Transfer plantain slices to a chopping board; flatten each one by placing a small plate on top and pressing down.. Dip plantain slices in cold water.. Reheat oil in the skillet over medium heat; cook plantain slices for 1 minute on each side.. Season to taste with salt and serve immediately.

name: Down Home Chitterlings
ingredients: {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'frozen chitterlings, thawed and cleaned'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, roughly chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'crushed red pepper flakes'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Place cleaned chitterlings in a 6-quart pot and cover with cold water.. Bring to a rolling boil; add onion and season with salt, garlic, and red pepper flakes.. Simmer until chitterlings are clear to white in color and reach desired tenderness, 3 to 4 hours.

name: Pan Fried Brussels Sprouts
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'crushed garlic'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': '', 'name': 'white onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'trimmed Brussels sprouts'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'garlic powder, or to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Heat olive oil in a cast-iron skillet over medium-low heat. Add garlic and stir until golden brown and fragrant, about 2 to 3 minutes. Add onion and cook until soft, stirring often, about 5 minutes.. Add Brussels sprouts and cook until one side of the sprouts turns golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes. Stir to turn sprouts over and cook until evenly golden brown, another 5 to 7 minutes. Season with salt, black pepper, and garlic powder.

name: Roast Leg of Lamb
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'leg of lamb'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, sliced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh rosemary'}

name: Cabbage Steaks
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'head', 'name': 'cabbage'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'light olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper, or to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Cut the bottom off of the cabbage and set it so the flat end is on the cutting board; cut into 1-inch thick slices. Arrange slices in a single layer in a large casserole dish.. Drizzle oil over cabbage slices and sprinkle with garlic. Season cabbage with salt and pepper. Cover the dish with aluminum foil.. Bake in the preheated oven until cabbage core is easily pierced with a fork, about 45 minutes.

name: Simple Grilled Lamb Chops
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'distilled white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'black pepper'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '(6 ounce)', 'name': 'lamb chops'}
